option.od: filenames of the SImage files to process.

synopsis.p: Extracts the geographics center point of an SImage file or files.

description.p: Extracts the geographics center point of an SImage file or files.
The start and end time of the image, a flag indicating whether the center pixel is on the earth, the geographic latitude and longitude and the filename are written to standard output.

example.description: Extract the center pixel of all the SImage files in the current directory and store them in the file "center.txt".
